attributes.action: abolish the extortionate charges for a british passport!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have the right, as British citizens, to a free passport for life.  Only foreigners wishing to obtain a british passport should have to pay and this amount should be treble what it is at the moment.  I have four children and the cost of renewing their passports every five years is £180!!!!!  Is this just another way for the Government to make money out of honest british citizens?
